meta.Agreement: Use of the APIs and any related data will be subject to the terms of the Open Licence and subject to terms and conditions

Notes:
Foreign currency withdrawal (UK cash machines) 
2% Foreign Cash Fee (min £2, max £5)

2.75% non-sterling transaction fee also applies

Cash withdrawals or buying currency/travellers cheques outside the UK 2% Foreign Cash Fee (min £2, max £5)

2.75% non-sterling transaction fee also applies

Purchases made outside the UK
2.75% Foreign Purchase Fee (min £1)

Purchases made anywhere in a foreign currency
2.75% Foreign Purchase Fee (min £1)

2.75% Non-Sterling Transaction Fee on
Foreign currency withdrawal (UK cash machines) and 
Cash withdrawals or buying currency/travellers cheques outside the UK
Sterling Travellers cheques 1% of value (min £3, max £50)
International Payment: Outwards Payment Standard Transfer £22
International Payment: Outward Payment Urgent Transfer £30
International Payment Outward Payment Agents’ Charges £8.50
International Payment: Outward Payment Agents Charge £12.50
International Payment: Outward Payments Euro to Europe (SEPA) £10
Foreign Drafts - Up to and including £100: £8
International Payments - Inwards Payments Up to and including £100: £1

Foreign Cheques paid in: Up to and including £100 - £5
(Payments by Negotiation or Collection)

Foreign Cheques paid in: £100.01 to £5,000 - £10
(Payments by Negotiation or Collection)
Foreign Cheques paid in: £5,000.01 to £20,000 - £30(Payments by Negotiation or Collection)

Foreign Cheques paid in: Above £20,000 - £60
(Payments by Negotiation or Collection)

CoreProduct.ProductDescription:
An everyday fee free account with no overdraft facility.

Bank anywhere with our mobile app, 24-hour telephony banking and online banking, Text alerts

OtherType.Name: CardScheme
OtherType.Description: The payment scheme whose logo appears on the card.

OtherType.Name: OverdraftAvailable
OtherType.Description: States if an overdraft is available.

OtherType.Name: PackagedAccountBenefits
OtherType.Description: States if the account comes with benefits.

OtherType.Name: RegularFee
OtherType.Description: States the frequency of the fee for using the product.

OtherType.Name: SetOffArrangement
OtherType.Description: Set-off against other debt product.

OtherType.Name: ChequeBookAvailable
OtherType.Description: States if a cheque book comes with the product.

OtherType.Name: CreditInterestRatePayable
OtherType.Description: This defines whether a credit interest is payable on the account.

OtherType.Name: Currency
OtherType.Description: A system of money, in any form, that can be used as a unit of account, medium of exchange and store of value.

OtherType.Name: CurrentAccountSwitchService
OtherType.Description: States if the product can be used with the current account switch service.

OtherType.Name: DebitCard
OtherType.Description: States if the product is offered with a debit card.

OtherType.Name: DirectDebits
OtherType.Description: This allows the customer to set up direct debits on the account.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: ElectronicPayments

OtherType.Name: ElectronicPayments
OtherType.Description: States whether the product is in the form of an electronic payment, i.e. making payments over an electronic system.

FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: BACS; Faster Payments; Domestic Payments; International Payments; CHAPS

OtherType.Name: InstantAccess
OtherType.Description: States if the product allows the customer to have instant access to their funds.

OtherType.Name: JointAccountAvailability
OtherType.Description: States if the product can be offered on a joint account basis.

OtherType.Name: NegotiableTariffOptions
OtherType.Description: Can the fees and components of the tariff be negotiated?

OtherType.Name: PaymentClearingSystemSupported
OtherType.Description: The payment systems supported by the product.

OtherType.Name: QuickDepositsServiceAvailability
OtherType.Description: States if 'quick deposits' are available with the product.

OtherType.Name: StandingOrderAvailability
OtherType.Description: States if standing orders can be used with this product.

OtherType.Name: TransfersAllowed
OtherType.Description: Between other types of account.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: DigitalServices
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Online Banking, Moblie App, Apple Pay

OtherType.Name: AutoTransfers
OtherType.Description: States if an automatic transfer can be created between accounts to ensure a minimum balance is maintained.

Notes:
Cash withdrawals or the purchase of currency or
travellers cheques outside the UK

Foreign Cash Fee of 2.25% of the total combined
value of the transaction including the Non Sterling
Transaction Fee (minimum £2, maximum £5)

Non Sterling Transaction Fee of 2.65% of the value of
the transaction

Purchases made outside the UK:

Foreign Purchase Fee of 75p per transaction

Non Sterling Transaction Fee of 2.65% of the value of
the transaction

Purchases made anywhere in a foreign currency:

Purchase Fee of 75p per transaction

Non Sterling Transaction Fee of 2.65% of the value of
the transaction

Withdrawing foreign currency from a cash machine in the UK:

Foreign Cash Fee of 2.25% of the total combined
value of the transaction including the Non Sterling
Transaction Fee (minimum £2, maximum £5).

Non Sterling Transaction Fee of 2.65% of the value of
the transaction

We can provide you with a copy of a previously issued statement. If you would like a statement that is less than seven years old there is no charge but if you would like a statement from more than seven years ago this will cost £10.
Stopping a cheque (unless it has been lost or stolen)
Getting a special clearance for a cheque £13

Request to return your cheque after it been cleared.
(charged if you ask for over 10 cheques)
Sterling and Non Sterling Inwards Payments (in favour of Ulster Bank customers): £6
Inward Payments (in favour of customers of other banks) Sterling and Non Sterling: £15
International Payment & Drafts Outwards Sterling to Ulster Bank Branches in ROI: £15
International Payment & Drafts Outwards Non Sterling Standard Payment: No Charge
International Payment & Drafts Outwards Non Sterling Urgent Payment: £25

International Payment & Drafts Outwards 
Non Sterling to Ulster Bank Branches in ROI Standard Payment: No Charge

International Payment & Drafts Outwards 
Non Sterling to Ulster Bank Branches in ROI Same Day Payment: 15

CoreProduct.ProductDescription:
All the benefits of our Private Current Account plus extra lifestyle benefits such as travel, protection and leisure advantages. 

You can apply for this account if you have a min. salary of £75k or £100k for joint applications. 

You can apply if you're a UK resident aged 18 or over.

CoreProduct.ProductDescription:
Get more flexibility by setting up an interest-free arranged overdraft when you open a Student account with us.

Interest free arranged overdraft of up to £1000 (more for certain degrees, subject to credit review & approval).

Available to UK residents aged 18 or over who already have an Ulster Bank Student account.

Notes:
Foreign currency withdrawal (UK cash machines) 
2% Foreign Cash Fee (min £2, max £5)

2.75% non-sterling transaction fee also applies

Cash withdrawals or buying currency/travellers cheques outside the UK 2% Foreign Cash Fee (min £2, max £5)

2.75% non-sterling transaction fee also applies

2.75% Foreign Purchase Fee (min £1)

2.75% Foreign Purchase Fee (min £1)

Sterling Travellers cheques 1% of value (min £3, max £50)
International Payment: Outwards Payment Standard Transfer £22
International Payment: Outward Payment Urgent Transfer £30
International Payment Outward Payment Agents’ Charges £8.50
International Payment: Outward Payment Agents Charge £12.50
International Payment: Outward Payments Euro to Europe (SEPA) £10
Foreign Drafts - Up to and including £100: £8
International Payments - Inwards Payments Up to and including £100: £1

(Payments by Negotiation or Collection)

Foreign Cheques paid in: £100.01 to £5,000 - £10
(Payments by Negotiation or Collection)

Foreign Cheques paid in: Above £20,000 - £60
(Payments by Negotiation or Collection)

CoreProduct.ProductDescription:
Select is our everyday bank account. 

With it you can get a range of time-saving features, like a contactless Visa debit card and an easy-to-use mobile app.

OtherEligibility.Name: Gradaute Eligibility
OtherEligibility.Textual:
Graduate accounts are available to individuals aged 18 or over who have:
• held a Student account; or
• graduated from a full time higher education course at a UK university or college
lasting at least 2 years within the last year.
Notes:
Graduate accounts are available to individuals aged 18 or over who have:
• held a Student account; or
• graduated from a full time higher education course at a UK university or college
lasting at least 2 years within the last year.

CoreProduct.ProductDescription:
With the Graduate account, you can get  Interest-free arranged overdraft of up to £1500 (subject to credit review and approval) for up to one year after you graduate.
 
Depending on your circumstances, you can request a Graduate Loan of up to £5000 (subject to credit review and approval).

Access Flexible ways to bank; Visa debit card, 24/7 Anytime Internet Banking plus our mobile banking app packed with handy features.

Commission-free travel money; Pick up commission-free foreign currency from your branch before you travel.

CoreProduct.ProductDescription:
The Private account offers you your own Relationship Manager and dedicated support team, plus preferential financial rates and services. 

You can apply for this account if you have a min. salary of £75k or £100k for joint applications. 

You can apply if you're a UK resident aged 18 or over.

OtherType.Name: CardScheme
OtherType.Description: The payment scheme whose logo appears on the card.

OtherType.Name: OverdraftAvailable
OtherType.Description: States if an overdraft is available.

OtherType.Name: PackagedAccountBenefits
OtherType.Description: States if the account comes with benefits.

OtherType.Name: RegularFee
OtherType.Description: States the frequency of the fee for using the product.

OtherType.Name: SetOffArrangement
OtherType.Description: Set-off against other debt product.

OtherType.Name: ChequeBookAvailable
OtherType.Description: States if a cheque book comes with the product.

OtherType.Name: CreditInterestRatePayable
OtherType.Description: This defines whether a credit interest is payable on the account.

OtherType.Name: Currency
OtherType.Description: A system of money, in any form, that can be used as a unit of account, medium of exchange and store of value.

OtherType.Name: CurrentAccountSwitchService
OtherType.Description: States if the product can be used with the current account switch service.

OtherType.Name: DebitCard
OtherType.Description: States if the product is offered with a debit card.

OtherType.Name: DirectDebits
OtherType.Description: This allows the customer to set up direct debits on the account.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: ElectronicPayments

OtherType.Name: ElectronicPayments
OtherType.Description: States whether the product is in the form of an electronic payment, i.e. making payments over an electronic system.

FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: BACS; Faster Payments; Domestic Payments; International Payments; CHAPS

OtherType.Name: InstantAccess
OtherType.Description: States if the product allows the customer to have instant access to their funds.

OtherType.Name: JointAccountAvailability
OtherType.Description: States if the product can be offered on a joint account basis.

OtherType.Name: NegotiableTariffOptions
OtherType.Description: Can the fees and components of the tariff be negotiated?

OtherType.Name: PaymentClearingSystemSupported
OtherType.Description: The payment systems supported by the product.

OtherType.Name: QuickDepositsServiceAvailability
OtherType.Description: States if 'quick deposits' are available with the product.

OtherType.Name: StandingOrderAvailability
OtherType.Description: States if standing orders can be used with this product.

OtherType.Name: TransfersAllowed
OtherType.Description: Between other types of account.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: DigitalServices
FeatureBenefitItem.Textual: Online Banking, Moblie App, Apple Pay, Android Pay, PayM

OtherType.Name: AutoTransfers
OtherType.Description: States if an automatic transfer can be created between accounts to ensure a minimum balance is maintained.

Notes:
Foreign currency withdrawal (UK cash machines) 
2% Foreign Cash Fee (min £2, max £5)

2.75% non-sterling transaction fee also applies

Cash withdrawals or buying currency/travellers cheques outside the UK 2% Foreign Cash Fee (min £2, max £5)

2.75% non-sterling transaction fee also applies

Purchases made outside the UK
2.75% Foreign Purchase Fee (min £1)

Purchases made anywhere in a foreign currency
2.75% Foreign Purchase Fee (min £1)

2.75% Non-Sterling Transaction Fee on
Foreign currency withdrawal (UK cash machines) and 
Cash withdrawals or buying currency/travellers cheques outside the UK
Sterling Travellers cheques 1% of value (min £3, max £50)
International Payment: Outwards Payment Standard Transfer £22
International Payment: Outward Payment Urgent Transfer £30
International Payment Outward Payment Agents’ Charges £8.50
International Payment: Outward Payment Agents Charge £12.50
International Payment: Outward Payments Euro to Europe (SEPA) £10
Foreign Drafts - Up to and including £100: £8
International Payments - Inwards Payments Up to and including £100: £1

Foreign Cheques paid in: Up to and including £100 - £5
(Payments by Negotiation or Collection)

Foreign Cheques paid in: £100.01 to £5,000 - £10
(Payments by Negotiation or Collection)
Foreign Cheques paid in: £5,000.01 to £20,000 - £30(Payments by Negotiation or Collection)

Foreign Cheques paid in: Above £20,000 - £60
(Payments by Negotiation or Collection)

CoreProduct.ProductDescription: Our children’s bank account which offers a Visa debit card.
